# Fire and Brimstone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]], [[5th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen]] 5 (fire)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of brimstone)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 104

*With a shout, you cause your foes to erupt in afoul, acrid-smelling burst of yellow fire.*

The subject ignites in a burst of sulfuric fire that deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) and causes the subject to be [[Sickened|sickened]] for 5 rounds. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the sickening.
